summary: New Dungeon, New Enemies, New Allies, New Gear.
descriptionHtml:
[color=gold][b][i][u]Mezaroth[/u][/i][/b]

[u]Who Or What Is Mezaroth[/u]
Mezaroth was once a nordic temple back in the first era, until one day a Necromancer entered the halls, and killed everyone inside, at the same time he absorbed their souls, and added them to his own, making his soul an abomination, many adventurers went to slay him, but all failed at his hand. It is said his name was given to him the day he drew his power from the very halls of Mezaroth, and allowed the lost souls of the dead to rise into the shadows as his slaves. He has been in slumber for nearly four thousand years, but as with the return of the dragons, so does he awake.
[u]Location[/u]
The Location of the dungeon is south-west of Falkreath, following the road passed Halldir\'s Cairn, at a place called Cyrodiil Pass.
[u]Requirements[/u]
Skyrim
Torches
The Wooden Key found on the body of a High Elf outside the Dungeon.
[u]Mezaroth\'s Staff[/u]
Damage = 0
Weight = 8
Value = 12900
Enchantment = Unrelenting Force & 50 Generic Damage[/color]
author: Enoomnai
